name: heart wings
notes:
i created this pattern for my tunisian mosaic crochet tutorial video; you can watch that at [https://youtu.be/zzpvhewvz5k][1]. 

this pattern is written just like all my other overlay mosaic crochet patterns but also includes a page to help teach you how to convert this (and all my other mosaic crochet patterns) into tunisian mosaic crochet.

**you can use this information to convert any of my mosaic crochet patterns into tunisian mosaic crochet.**



***important details***

•	us crochet terminology
•	chart is 15 x 17
•	size without fringe or border: 4.5” x 5” / 11.5cm x 13cm
•	5 mm hook (h-8)
•	worsted weight yarn (22 - 37 yards total)
     o	main color (dark lines) – 10 yards
     o	contrasting color (background) – 12 yards
     o	optional envelope border – 15 yards
•	gauge: 14 stitches x 15 rows = 4”


____

**techniques**

this pattern is written up for overlay mosaic crochet (and includes an x-marked chart).

you can follow the chart or written pattern.

there is video support and information in this pattern to help teach you how to convert from the overlay mosaic crochet technique to tunisian mosaic crochet.


i have youtube tutorials available for both crochet methods! follow this link to get to my youtube channel and find my other social links: [https://ashleeslint.com/link-in-bio][2]
_____
